ref.mixed-citation: IUCN. Land Degradation and Climate Change: The multiple benefits of sustainable land management in the drylands. In The twenty-first session of the Conference of the Parties (COP) and the eleventh session of the Conference of the Parties serving as the meeting of the Parties to the Kyoto Protocol (CMP) took place from 30 November to 11 December 2015, in Paris, France, (2015).
